1. One morning
2. a little girl called Lily came across a needle in her bedroom.
3. She realized it would be unsafe to play with it
4. because it was pointed.
5. Lily wanted to give the needle to her mother
6. so her mother could sew a button onto her shirt.
7. Lily went to her mother
8. and asked
9. "Mom,
10. I found a needle.
11. Could you give it to me
12. and sew a button on my shirt?"
13. Her mother smiled
14. and replied
15. "Yes,
16. Lily,
17. we can use it together
18. and mend your shirt."
19. Together
20. they used the needle
21. and sewed the button onto Lily's shirt.
22. It wasn't hard for them
23. because they shared
24. and helped one another.
25. When they had finished
26. Lily thanked her mother for sharing the needle
27. and mending her shirt.
28. Both of them felt happy
29. because they had shared
30. and worked as a team.
